data.name: Arcade Legend
data.detailed_description:
It’s run down, sure, but it has a lot of potential. In order to rebuild this magnificent venue to its former glory, you'll need to do some cleaning and decorating. Customize the look and feel of your arcade using a multitude of materials.







Perform tasks and complete objectives to improve your arcade, earn revenue and build up Reputation. Attract customers in the form of NPCs and unlock expansive areas containing additional anchor attractions like bowling, axe-throwing and more!







Compete against friends and other players on local and global leaderboards or play on your own against NPC customers. Win tickets that can be traded in at the redemption counter for avatar accessories or fun novelties and prizes.







Open your arcade up to the public and allow people from around the globe visit your venue, or just keep it casual and invite friends to your arcade to play side-by-side in friendly multiplayer games and activities.








  • Building and customizing your OWN arcade (you're the #boss)
  • Hanging out/socializing with friends
  • Playing officially licensed arcade games (from the comfort of your own home)
  • Unlocking exciting attractions (axe-throwing, anyone?)
  • Challenging other players and claiming the top spot on the leaderboards
  • Winning tickets and exchanging them for cool unique prizes
  • Customizing your own avatar
  • Retro, 80's inspired aesthetics
  • Hosting your own dance party (you control the jukebox)
  • Having fun in VR


If you like 8-10 points:
A no-brainer. You will definitely love this game!

If you like 7-5 points:
Knowing that you can customize your own experience and play games for free, we think you'll have a great time.

If you like 4-2 points:
We think it's worth giving it a try (you never know if you never try). It might just surprise you!

If you like 0-1 points:
Sorry, this game probably isn't for you. :(

data.short_description: Leverage your creativity to build, customize and decorate your very own arcade! Attract customers and build Reputation to unlock new attractions. Fill your venue with officially licensed arcade games, and play solo against NPC competitors or hang out and socialize with friends in multiplayer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR headset and controllers
